verses.roman:
nīlācale āchoṅ muñi tāṅhāra ājñāte
madhye madhye āsimu tāṅra caraṇa dekhite

synonyms: nīlācale āchoṅ—stay at Jagannātha Purī, Nīlācala; muñi—I; tāṅhāra ājñāte—under her order; madhye madhye—at intervals; āsimu—I shall go; tāṅra—her; caraṇa dekhite—to see the lotus feet.
translation: "I am staying here at Jagannātha Purī, Nīlācala, to comply with her orders. However, at intervals I shall go see her lotus feet.
